actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to provide that the pay of certain Federal executive and legislative officers for a calendar year shall be reduced or increased, depending upon whether there was Federal budgetary deficit or surplus in the preceding fiscal year.

summary.text: Provides that the pay of Federal executive and legislative officers, including the Vice President and Members of Congress shall be reduced or increased for any calendar year depending upon whether there was Federal budgetary deficit or surplus in the preceding fiscal year.

titles.title: A bill to provide that the pay of certain Federal executive and legislative officers for a calendar year shall be reduced or increased, depending upon whether there was Federal budgetary deficit or surplus in the preceding fiscal year.
